data.title: Shelton
data.meta_description: See hours, parking information, and timetables for Metro-North Railroadâ€™s Derby-Shelton station.
data.text:
There are no ticket machines at this station. Riders from this station can buy tickets on board trains with no additional fee using cash, credit, or debit cards. Buy tickets ahead of time using the TrainTime app.

Get help

See Metro-North Railroad timetables.

Report a problem: Call 877-690-5114 or use our Customer Feedback form.

Chat with us: Use the TrainTime app.

Metro-North Care: If you need assistance getting on or off the train, we can ensure staff is prepared to assist. Visit the Metro-North Care program page for more information, including how to call
